mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_stock( id, provider_id, user_id, good_id, variety_amount, unit_cost, amount, sum, check_conclusion, time, clearing_form, handler) VALUE(#{id}, #{providerInfo.id},#{user.id},#{goodInfo.id}, #{varietyAmount},#{unitCost}, #{amount},#{sum}, #{checkConclusion},#{time},#{clearingForm}, #{handler})
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_stock SET provider_id=#{providerInfo.id}, good_id=#{goodInfo.id}, user_id=#{user.id}, variety_amount=#{varietyAmount}, unit_cost=#{unitCost}, amount=#{amount}, sum=#{sum}, check_conclusion =#{checkConclusion}, time=#{time}, clearing_form=#{clearingForm}, handler=#{handler} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: WHERE id = #{id}
